price: 35. У ўз сеҳри билан сизларни ўз ерларингиздан чиқармоқчи, нима дейсизлар?», деди.
arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُم بِسِحۡرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ

version.title: Uzbek translation - Alauddin Mansour
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Alauddin Mansour, printed in 1430 H. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yurīdu an yukh'rijakum min arḍikum bisiḥ'rihi famādhā tamurūna
